orig_text:
delta: V_8 -> Q  bijective mapping that maps a binary string from V_8
           into an element from field Q as follows: string
           z_7||...||z_1||z_0, where z_i in {0, 1}, i = 0, ..., 7,
           corresponds to the element z_0+(z_1*theta)+...+(z_7*theta^7)
           belonging to Z,
correct_text:
delta: V_8 -> Q  bijective mapping that maps a binary string from V_8
           into an element from field Q as follows: string
           z_7||...||z_1||z_0, where z_i in {0, 1}, i = 0, ..., 7,
           corresponds to the element z_0+(z_1*theta)+...+(z_7*theta^7)
           belonging to Q,
